content: अतिवह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To carry over or across. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To spend, pass (as time); किं वा मयापि न दिनान्यतिवाहितानि <ls>Māl. 6. 13</ls>; अतिवाहयांबभूव त्रियामां <ls>R. 9. 70</ls>; ऋतून् <ls n="R.">19. 47.</ls> {@--2@} To let pass over, get through successfully; गुहाविसारीण्यतिवाहितानि मया कथंचिद्घनगर्जितानि <ls>R. 13. 28</ls> allowed to pass over my head, endured; स शापस्तेनातिवाहितः <ls>Ks. 33. 91.</ls> {@--3@} To rid oneself of, elude, avoid; अस्मिंस्तमालविटपांधकारे प्रविश्य एनमतिवाहयावः <ls>Ratn. 2</ls> get out of his way, elude his pursuit (and thus cheat him). {@--4@} To transplant, remove (to another place), bring or carry over; अलकामतिवाह्यैव वसतिं वसुसंपदां <ls>Ku. 6. 37.</ls> {@--5@} To follow, tread (as a path); लोकातिवाहिते मार्गे <ls>Sarva.</ls>
